How FREE DELIVERY works
  • You will receive free delivery on any bedding or blankets in your order if they add up to R2499 or more
  • Other non-bedding items in your order will not qualify for free delivery
  • Customers living outside South Africa will receive discounted delivery fees

  • You will receive free delivery on any bedding or blankets in your order if they add up to R2499 or more
  • Other non-bedding items in your order will not qualify for free delivery
  • Customers living outside South Africa will receive discounted delivery fees
